keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes government cuts to schools, wants to ensure children can go to school in Chester.
Together with the community, fought fracking in the local area to protect the environment.
Secured superfast cable broadband for 45,000 Chester homes.
Acts as a voice for local businesses and recognizes their challenges.

issues.education: Chris Matheson opposes government cuts to schools and stands up for every parent, teacher, and pupil in Chester.
issues.environment: Chris Matheson worked with the community to fight fracking in the Upton and Guilden Sutton areas.

housing.content: Lists 'Housing' among the issues he has taken a look at.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud to be known as Chester's hardest working MP ever.

politicalExperience.achievements: Holds regular Open Door meetings to listen to constituents, secured superfast cable broadband for 45,000 Chester homes, and opposed fracking in the local community.

quotes.text: I'm running a positive campaign, a positive vision for our city -- about everything we have done and everything we are going to do.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Chris emphasizes his local focus over party politics, representing Chester's voice in London, not London's voice in Chester.
